if.description: An expression to control conditional rendering of the cube in C-style syntax. Block states can be referenced with their names.

pos.description: The coordinates of the bottom-left-back corner of the cube.

size.description: The size of the cube in each axis.

translate.description: Translates this cube or any cubes from the "copy" property. This is applied after automatic UV calculations.

rot.description: The XYZ rotation of the cube (in degrees; applied in the order X-Y-Z) around its pivot.

pivot.description: The center of rotation of the cube. Defaults to [8, 8, 8].

uv.description: UV coordinate overrides for each face.

..description: The UV coordinates to use for this face, with (0, 0) being the top-left corner of the texture.

uv_sizes.description: UV size overrides for each face.

..description: The UV size to use for this face, measured in pixels.

textures.description: Forces a face to use the texture of another face, or a texture located at a given file path.

oneOf.description: A file path to a texture file, without the file extension.

texture_size.description: Defines the expected size of the texture, for use in UV. Defaults to [16, 16].

copy.description: Copies another block shape to use in this block shape. Translation can be achieved with the "translate" property ("pos" has no effect), and other fields will be copied over as well.

copy_block.description: Copies an entire block. Must resolve to an object with the same structure as a block palette entry.

block_states.description: Block states to be passed to the block shape copy specified in the "copy" property.

^[\\w:]+$.description: The block state to be passed to the block shape copy.

terrain_texture.description: Forces this cube to use a specific terrain_texture.json key.

variant.description: Forces this cube to use a specific variant instead of looking at block states (or the eigenvariant).

ignore_eigenvariant.description: Makes a cube ignore the eigenvariant associated with this block, and instead rely on block states for variants.

tint.description: A tinting colour in 6-digit hex or in a 32-bit ARGB number to apply to this cube (overrides TextureAtlas.#terrainTextureTints).

flip_textures_horizontally.description: An array of faces that will have their textures horizontally flipped.

flip_textures_vertically.description: An array of faces that will have their textures vertically flipped.

arrays.description: Named arrays that can be used by other properties. Currently, only "tint" supports accessing arrays.

disable_merging.description: Disables this cube from being automatically merged with any other cubes.
